title: Vietnam

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Lie in ambush outside someone’s house, scaring off all visitors.
- Deal a Basic attack to a visitor of your target. (Costs 4 Gold)
- Learn the roles of all visitors to your target. (Costs 2 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask, however you may not lie in ambush and perform the Factional Kill until you are the last Civilization.
- If you lie in ambush outside another Civilization, grant them Powerful defense.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were killed by Vietnamese ambushers.” (Factional Kill or Killing a Visitor)
“You were scared off from your target!” (Attempting to visit ambushed target)

desc:
Post 2137
*“You can kill ten of my men for every one I kill of yours. But even at those odds, you will lose and I will win.” -Ho Chi Minh*
